mapper.select:
SELECT t.empid, t.empname FROM [dbo].[t_empinfo] t where t.deletefg = '0' and t.status = '0' and t.username = #{username} and t.password = #{password}
and t.empid in (select empid from t_emporg where orgcdid = #{orgcdid})
select max(V.applyno) as applyno from ( SELECT Substring(applyno, 4, 13) as applyno FROM [dbo].[t_applyform] t where t.deletefg = '0' and t.applyno like '%'+#{sysdate}+'%' ) V

select convert(char(19), t.updatetime, 120) as updatetime, t.pid, t.operatorid, t.operatorname, t.operationcd, dict1.busidictname as operationcddict, t.remark from ${table} t left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict1 on t.operationcd = dict1.busidictid and dict1.busidicttypeid = #{busidicttypeid} where t.pid = #{pid} order by updatetime

select convert(char(19), t.updatetime, 120) as updatetime, t.ticketdetailid, t.applyid, t.orderdate, t.flight, t.start, t.reach, t.discountflag, t.ticketflag from t_ticketdetail t where t.applyid = #{applyid} and t.deletefg = '0' order by t.s_organize
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [dbo].[s_roleresource] ([roleid] ,[resourceid]) VALUES (#{roleid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{resourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
